mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND "ROLE" in ('GENERAL', 'ADMIN')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PASSWORD, IDNUM, EMAIL, PHONE ) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL,#{memberId},#{memberName},#{password1},#{idNum},#{email},#{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, PASSWORD = #{password1}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE= #{phone} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
